data.why:
Shape.pm, an interface to Frank Warmerdam's C library shapelib,
    which is for reading and writing shapefiles, which are for GIS
    vector data. Maybe using the name GIS::Shape thus finally starting
    the GIS namespace. I was prompted for this by Greg Garret from NOAA
    who is using Shape.pm.

    Terveisi√§ Jarkolle :-)
